lead_paragraph: A militant network the United States considers a terrorist group is playing a greater role in the insurgency, raising fears of worsening fighting ahead.

byline.contributor: Farooq Jan Mangal contributed reporting from Khost, Afghanistan; Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan; and Eric Schmitt from Washington.

headline.print_headline: Haqqani Terror Group Steers Deadlier Taliban in Afghanistan, Officials Say
headline.main: Haqqanis Steering Deadlier Taliban in Afghanistan, Officials Say

snippet: A militant network the United States considers a terrorist group is playing a greater role in the insurgency, raising fears of worsening fighting ahead.
abstract: Afghan and American officials report Haqqani militant network, led by Sirajuddin Haqqani, have assumed leadership of Taliban in development many fear will cause more terror in region.
